CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content analysis template to enable intelligent categorization.
CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Creating a template for a specified analysis task

CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content analysis template to enable intelligent categorization and intelligent tagging.
CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Creating a template for multiple analysis tasks

CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content analysis template to enable all intelligent analysis tasks.
CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Creating a template to enable all content analysis tasks

CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content recognition template with face recognition enabled. The default face library is used, and the face recognition filter score is 90.
CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.title: Creating a template for multiple video content recognition tasks

CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content recognition template with face recognition enabled. The default and custom face libraries are used, and the face recognition filter score is 90.
CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.title: Creating a template for multiple recognition tasks, with the frame capturing interval specified

CreateAdaptiveDynamicStreamingTemplate.title: Creating an adaptive bitrate streaming template

CreateAnimatedGraphicsTemplate.title: Creating an animated image generating template

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom intelligent content recognition template to enable only the porn information recognition task, with the following configuration. Threshold scores for rule violation and human recognition: default values; filter tags: not specified.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating an intelligent content recognition template to enable only the porn information recognition task

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom intelligent content recognition template to enable the porn information recognition task, with the threshold scores for rule violation and human recognition set to 80 and 30, respectively.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating an intelligent content recognition template to enable only the porn information recognition task with specified rule violation threshold and frame capturing interval

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom intelligent content recognition template to enable porn, terrorism, and politically sensitive information recognition tasks with the following configuration. Threshold scores for rule violation and human recognition: default values; filter tags: not specified.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating an intelligent content recognition template to enable multiple recognition tasks

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom intelligent content recognition template to enable the porn information recognition task with the following configuration. Threshold values for rule violation and human recognition: default values; filter tags: “porn” and “sexy”.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating a content recognition template to enable porn information recognition with specified filter tags

CreateImageSpriteTemplate.title: Creating an image sprite generating template

CreatePersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=CreatePersonSample
&Name=John Smith
&Tags.0=US
&Tags.1=Celebrity
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&Usages.0=Recognition.Face
&Usages.1=Review.Face
&FaceContents.
&FaceContents.
&<Common request parameters>
CreatePersonSample.title: Creating an image sample

CreateSnapshotByTimeOffsetTemplate.title: Creating a time point screenshot template

CreateWordSamples.document: If Usages=Review, then the keyword can be used for OCR- and ASR-based detection of inappropriate content.
CreateWordSamples.title: Creating a keyword sample - `Review`

CreateWordSamples.document: If Usages=["Recognition.Ocr","Review.Ocr"], then the keyword can be used for OCR-based content recognition and inappropriate information detection.
CreateWordSamples.title: Creating a keyword sample - `Recognition`

CreateWordSamples.document: If Usages=All, then the keyword can be used for OCR- and ASR-based content recognition and inappropriate information detection.
CreateWordSamples.title: Creating a keyword sample - `All`

CreateWorkflow.document: This example shows you how to set a transcoding rule named "trans-100020-100030-100040" for the `TopRankVideo-125xxx88` bucket to generate output in the three formats of 100020, 100030, and 100040.
CreateWorkflow.title: Setting a transcoding rule

CreateWorkflow.document: This example shows you how to set a transcoding rule named "snapshot" for the `TopRankVideo-125xxx88` bucket to generate output in the format of 100010.
CreateWorkflow.title: Setting a sampled screenshot rule

DeleteAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to delete a custom video content analysis template.
DeleteAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Deleting the content analysis template whose ID is 30

DescribeAIAnalysisTemplates.document: This example shows you how to get 10 video content analysis templates with the serial number starting from 0, including system default ones.
DescribeAIAnalysisTemplates.title: Getting the video content analysis template whose ID is 30

DescribeAIAnalysisTemplates.document: This example shows you how to get up to 10 video content analysis templates, including preset ones. The offset for the start of the operation is `0`.

DescribeAIRecognitionTemplates.document: This example shows you how to get 10 video content recognition templates with the serial number starting from 0.
DescribeAIRecognitionTemplates.title: Getting the video content recognition template whose ID is 30

DescribeAIRecognitionTemplates.document: This example shows you how to get up to 10 video content recognition templates. The offset for the start of the operation is `0`.

DescribeContentReviewTemplates.document: This example shows you how to get up to 10 intelligent content recognition templates, including preset ones. The offset for the start of the operation is `0`.
DescribeContentReviewTemplates.title: Getting a specified number of intelligent content recognition templates

DescribeWordSamples.title: Getting a list of keyword samples - with filters

DisableWorkflow.document: This example shows you how to disable the workflow whose ID is 19000.
DisableWorkflow.title: Disabling a workflow

EditMedia.title: Clipping a file to generate a new video

EnableWorkflow.document: This example shows you how to enable the workflow whose ID is 10000.

ExecuteFunction.title: Customer A initiating a custom video processing task

ManageTask.title: Terminating specified live stream processing task

ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom video content analysis template to enable intelligent thumbnail generation.
ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Enabling intelligent thumbnail generation

ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom video content analysis template to disable intelligent thumbnail generation.
ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Disabling intelligent thumbnail generation

ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom video content analysis template to enable intelligent tagging and disable intelligent thumbnail generation.
ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Enabling a content analysis task and disabling another

ModifyAIRecognitionTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom video content recognition template to disable full text recognition and enable text keyword recognition.
ModifyAIRecognitionTemplate.title: Enabling a content recognition task and disabling another

ModifyAdaptiveDynamicStreamingTemplate.title: Modifying an adaptive bitrate streaming template

ModifyAnimatedGraphicsTemplate.title: Modifying an animated image generating template

ModifyContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom intelligent content recognition template with the following configuration. Threshold scores for rule violation and human recognition: default values; filter tags: not specified.
ModifyContentReviewTemplate.title: Modifying an intelligent content recognition template to enable porn recognition

ModifyContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom intelligent content recognition template with the following configuration. Threshold score for rule violation: 90; threshold score for human recognition: 60; filter tags: not specified.
ModifyContentReviewTemplate.title: Modifying an intelligent content recognition template to enable porn recognition with threshold scores specified

ModifyContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom intelligent content recognition template with the following configuration. Threshold score for rule violation: 90; threshold score for human recognition: 60; filter tags: sexy.
ModifyContentReviewTemplate.title: Modifying an intelligent content recognition template to enable porn recognition with filter tags and threshold scores specified

ModifyImageSpriteTemplate.title: Modifying an image sprite generating template

ModifyPersonSample.document: This example shows you how to modify the name and description of an image sample.
ModifyPersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=ModifyPersonSample
&PersonId=10569
&Name=John Smith
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&Usages.0=All
&<Common request parameters>
ModifyPersonSample.title: Modifying an image sample

ModifyPersonSample.document: This example shows you how to add a facial feature image and image tag.
ModifyPersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=ModifyPersonSample
&PersonId=10569
&Name=John Smith
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&FaceOperationInfo.Type=add
&FaceOperationInfo.FaceContents.
&TagOperationInfo.Type=add
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.0=US
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.1=Celebrity
&<Common request parameters>
ModifyPersonSample.title: Modifying an image sample - `add`

ModifyPersonSample.document: This example shows you how to reset a facial feature image and image tag.
ModifyPersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=ModifyPersonSample
&PersonId=10569
&Name=John Smith
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&FaceOperationInfo.Type=reset
&FaceOperationInfo.FaceContents.
&FaceOperationInfo.FaceContents.
&TagOperationInfo.Type=reset
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.0=US
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.1=Celebrity
&<Common request parameters>
ModifyPersonSample.title: Modifying an image sample - `reset`

ModifyPersonSample.document: This example shows you how to delete a facial feature image and image tag.
ModifyPersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=ModifyPersonSample
&PersonId=10569
&Name=John Smith
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&FaceOperationInfo.Type=delete
&FaceOperationInfo.FaceIds.0=10026
&TagOperationInfo.Type=delete
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.0=US
&<Common request parameters>
ModifyPersonSample.title: Modifying an image sample - `delete`

ModifySnapshotByTimeOffsetTemplate.title: Modifying a time point screenshot template

ParseLiveStreamProcessNotification.title: Parsing a live stream event notification

ProcessLiveStream.document: This example shows you how to initiate a content recognition task for a live stream whose URL is `http://www.abc.com/abc.m3u8`.
ProcessLiveStream.title: Initiating a live stream moderation task

ProcessMedia.document: This example shows you how to initiate a transcoding task for a specified COS endpoint to output videos in the three formats of 20, 30, and 40.
ProcessMedia.title: Initiating a transcoding task

ResetWorkflow.document: This example shows you how to reset the transcoding rule of the workflow whose ID is 2573 to add a watermark to the transcoding output.
ResetWorkflow.title: Resetting a transcoding rule
